items.question: What types of waste do you collect?
items.answer: We collect all types of waste including wet waste (kitchen waste, garden waste), dry waste (paper, plastic, metal, glass), recyclables, e-waste (electronic items), and organic waste. We segregate everything properly for appropriate processing.

items.question: What areas do you serve?
items.answer: We primarily serve Ambajogai and surrounding areas in Beed district, Maharashtra. We are expanding our services to nearby villages and towns. Contact us to check if we serve your area.

items.question: How do I schedule a pickup?
items.answer: You can schedule a pickup by clicking the 'Book Pickup' button on our website, calling us at 9607195770, or messaging us on WhatsApp. We offer regular daily/weekly schedules or one-time pickups as per your needs.

items.question: What are your collection timings?
items.answer: We collect waste daily during morning hours (7 AM - 11 AM) for residential areas and flexible timings for commercial establishments. Regular schedules are maintained for subscribed customers.

items.question: What happens to the collected waste?
items.answer: Collected waste is segregated at our facility. Wet waste goes to our bio-composting unit where it's converted into organic manure. Dry waste is sent to authorized recycling partners. E-waste is disposed through proper channels ensuring environmental safety.

items.question: Do you provide bio-compost? How can I purchase it?
items.answer: Yes! We produce high-quality bio-compost from wet waste. You can purchase it through our Shop page or by contacting us directly. Available in 5kg, 10kg, and 25kg bags. Great for gardens, farms, and potted plants.

items.question: What are your service charges?
items.answer: Service charges vary based on the type of service, frequency, and quantity of waste. Residential services start from affordable monthly plans. Contact us at 9607195770 for a customized quote for your needs.

items.question: How does waste segregation help the environment?
items.answer: Proper waste segregation reduces landfill burden, enables effective recycling, prevents soil and water pollution, reduces greenhouse gas emissions from decomposing waste, and helps create valuable compost from organic waste. It's crucial for a sustainable future.

items.question: What types of waste do you collect?
items.answer: We collect all types of waste including wet waste (kitchen waste, garden waste), dry waste (paper, plastic, metal, glass), and e-waste. Our services are designed to handle both organic and inorganic waste through proper segregation and processing.

items.question: What areas do you serve?
items.answer: We currently serve Ambajogai and surrounding areas in Beed district. Our services are available for both residential and commercial establishments within our service area.

items.question: How do I schedule a pickup?
items.answer: You can schedule a pickup through our website, mobile app, or by calling our customer service. Simply select your preferred date and time slot, and our team will arrive as scheduled.

items.question: What are your collection timings?
items.answer: We offer flexible collection timings from 8:00 AM to 8:00 PM, seven days a week. You can choose a convenient time slot when scheduling your pickup.

items.question: What happens to the collected waste?
items.answer: Collected waste is carefully segregated. Organic waste is processed into high-quality compost, while recyclable materials are sent to authorized recycling facilities. E-waste is handled by certified recyclers following all environmental norms.

items.question: Do you provide bio-compost? How can I purchase it?
items.answer: Yes, we produce premium quality bio-compost from processed organic waste. You can purchase it directly from our facility or through our online store. We offer various packaging options (5kg, 10kg, 25kg) for home and commercial use.

items.question: What are your service charges?
items.answer: Our service charges vary based on the type and quantity of waste, frequency of collection, and additional services required. Please contact our customer care for a customized quote based on your specific needs.

items.question: How does waste segregation help the environment?
items.answer: Proper waste segregation reduces landfill burden, minimizes pollution, conserves resources through recycling, and enables effective composting. It's a crucial step towards sustainable waste management and environmental protection.
